name: Mewtwo
author: Ken Sugimori
flavor_text: A scientist created this Pokémon after years of horrific gene-splicing and DNA engineering experiments.

attacks.name: Psychic
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Barrier
attacks.effect: Discard 1 {P} Energy card attached to Mewtwo in order to use this attack. During your opponent’s next turn, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Mewtwo.
